verses.verse: Moreover, when ye shall divide<WH5307> by lot the land<WH776> for inheritance<WH5159>, ye shall offer<WH7311> an oblation<WH8641> unto the LORD<WH3068>, an holy portion<WH6944> of the land<WH776>: the length<WH753> shall be the length<WH753> of five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> reeds, and the breadth<WH7341> shall be ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505>. This shall be holy<WH6944> in all the borders<WH1366> thereof round about<WH5439>.

Of this there shall be for the sanctuary<WH6944> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> in length, with five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> in breadth, square<WH7251> round about<WH5439>; and fifty<WH2572> cubits<WH520> round about<WH5439> for the suburbs<WH4054> thereof.

And of this measure<WH4060> shalt thou measure<WH4058> the length<WH753> of five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505>, and the breadth<WH7341> of ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505>: and in it shall be the sanctuary<WH4720> and the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> place.

The holy<WH6944> portion of the land<WH776> shall be for the priests<WH3548> the ministers<WH8334> of the sanctuary<WH4720>, which shall come near<WH7131> to minister<WH8334> unto the LORD<WH3068>: and it shall be a place<WH4725> for their houses<WH1004>, and an holy place<WH4720> for the sanctuary<WH4720>.

And the five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> of length<WH753>, and the ten<WH6235> thousand<WH505> of breadth<WH7341>, shall also the Levites<WH3881>, the ministers<WH8334> of the house<WH1004>, have for themselves, for a possession<WH272> for twenty<WH6242> chambers<WH3957>.

¶ And ye shall appoint<WH5414> the possession<WH272> of the city<WH5892> five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> broad<WH7341>, and five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> thousand<WH505> long<WH753>, over against<WH5980> the oblation<WH8641> of the holy<WH6944> portion: it shall be for the whole house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.

¶ And a portion shall be for the prince<WH5387> on the one side and on the other side of the oblation<WH8641> of the holy<WH6944> portion, and of the possession<WH272> of the city<WH5892>, before<WH6440> the oblation<WH8641> of the holy<WH6944> portion, and before<WH6440> the possession<WH272> of the city<WH5892>, from the west<WH3220> side<WH6285> westward<WH3220>, and from the east<WH6924> side<WH6285> eastward<WH6921>: and the length<WH753> shall be over against<WH5980> one<WH259> of the portions<WH2506>, from the west<WH3220> border<WH1366> unto the east<WH6921> border<WH1366>.

In the land<WH776> shall be his possession<WH272> in Israel<WH3478>: and my princes<WH5387> shall no more oppress<WH3238> my people<WH5971>; and the rest of the land<WH776> shall they give<WH5414> to the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> according to their tribes<WH7626>.

¶ Thus saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Let it suffice<WH7227> you, O princes<WH5387> of Israel<WH3478>: remove<WH5493> violence<WH2555> and spoil<WH7701>, and execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> and justice<WH6666>, take away<WH7311> your exactions<WH1646> from my people<WH5971>, saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.
Ye shall have just<WH6664> balances<WH3976>, and a just<WH6664> ephah<WH374>, and a just<WH6664> bath<WH1324>.

The ephah<WH374> and the bath<WH1324> shall be of one<WH259> measure<WH8506>, that the bath<WH1324> may contain<WH5375> the tenth part<WH4643> of an homer<WH2563>, and the ephah<WH374> the tenth part<WH6224> of an homer<WH2563>: the measure<WH4971> thereof shall be after the homer<WH2563>.

And the shekel<WH8255> shall be twenty<WH6242> gerahs<WH1626>: twenty<WH6242> shekels<WH8255>, five<WH2568> and twenty<WH6242> shekels<WH8255>, fifteen<WH2568><WH6235> shekels<WH8255>, shall be your maneh<WH4488>.

This is the oblation<WH8641> that ye shall offer<WH7311>; the sixth part<WH8345> of an ephah<WH374> of an homer<WH2563> of wheat<WH2406>, and ye shall give the sixth part<WH8341> of an ephah<WH374> of an homer<WH2563> of barley<WH8184>:

Concerning the ordinance<WH2706> of oil<WH8081>, the bath<WH1324> of oil<WH8081>, ye shall offer the tenth part<WH4643> of a bath<WH1324> out of the cor<WH3734>, which is an homer<WH2563> of ten<WH6235> baths<WH1324>; for ten<WH6235> baths<WH1324> are an homer<WH2563>:

And one<WH259> lamb<WH7716> out of the flock<WH6629>, out of two hundred<WH3967>, out of the fat pastures<WH4945> of Israel<WH3478>; for a meat offering<WH4503>, and for a burnt offering<WH5930>, and for peace offerings<WH8002>, to make reconciliation<WH3722> for them, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.
All the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> shall give this oblation<WH8641> for the prince<WH5387> in Israel<WH3478>.

And it shall be the prince's part<WH5387> to give burnt offerings<WH5930>, and meat offerings<WH4503>, and drink offerings<WH5262>, in the feasts<WH2282>, and in the new moons<WH2320>, and in the sabbaths<WH7676>, in all solemnities<WH4150> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>: he shall prepare<WH6213> the sin offering<WH2403>, and the meat offering<WH4503>, and the burnt offering<WH5930>, and the peace offerings<WH8002>, to make reconciliation<WH3722> for the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.

Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; In the first<WH7223> month, in the first<WH259> day of the month<WH2320>, thou shalt take<WH3947> a young<WH1121><WH1241> bullock<WH6499> without blemish<WH8549>, and cleanse<WH2398> the sanctuary<WH4720>:

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> of the blood<WH1818> of the sin offering<WH2403>, and put<WH5414> it upon the posts<WH4201> of the house<WH1004>, and upon the four<WH702> corners<WH6438> of the settle<WH5835> of the altar<WH4196>, and upon the posts<WH4201> of the gate<WH8179> of the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691>.

And so thou shalt do<WH6213> the seventh<WH7651> day of the month<WH2320> for every one<WH376> that erreth<WH7686>, and for him that is simple<WH6612>: so shall ye reconcile<WH3722> the house<WH1004>.

In the first<WH7223> month, in the fourteenth<WH702><WH6240> day<WH3117> of the month<WH2320>, ye shall have the passover<WH6453>, a feast<WH2282> of seven<WH7620> days<WH3117>; unleavened bread<WH4682> shall be eaten<WH398>.
And upon that day<WH3117> shall the prince<WH5387> prepare<WH6213> for himself and for all the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> a bullock<WH6499> for a sin offering<WH2403>.

And seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> of the feast<WH2282> he shall prepare<WH6213> a burnt offering<WH5930> to the LORD<WH3068>, seven<WH7651> bullocks<WH6499> and seven<WH7651> rams<WH352> without blemish<WH8549> daily<WH3117> the seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>; and a kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> daily<WH3117> for a sin offering<WH2403>.
And he shall prepare<WH6213> a meat offering<WH4503> of an ephah<WH374> for a bullock<WH6499>, and an ephah<WH374> for a ram<WH352>, and an hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081> for an ephah<WH374>.

In the seventh<WH7651> month, in the fifteenth<WH2568><WH6240> day<WH3117> of the month<WH2320>, shall he do<WH6213> the like in the feast<WH2282> of the seven<WH7637> days<WH3117>, according to the sin offering<WH2403>, according to the burnt offering<WH5930>, and according to the meat offering<WH4503>, and according to the oil<WH8081>.
